text: Jonathan Goldsmith (born September 26, 1938) or Jonathan Lippe is an American movie, television, stage, and voice actor. He is known for playing "The Most Interesting Man in the World" in the Dos Equis commercials starting in 2007. Goldsmith was born in September 26, 1938 in New York City, New York to a Jewish family. He studied at Boston University. He was married to Barbara Goldsmith since 2006. He now lives in Marina del Rey, California and in Manchester, Vermont. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Boston University alumni Category:Jewish American actors
title: Jonathan Goldsmith
